channel.title: How can I make my Npcs move?
channel.description:
Here is a picture of one of my npcs, I want to make it move to another spot...and walk around but each time I put another set of coords,I restart the client and hans is gone. So how do I make it walk?
[IMG]http://i164.photobucket.com/albums/u12/dvsk8ter7/exam.jpg[/img] :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 11:20:44 PM[/size][hr]prize 4+ rep[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 11:34:05 PM[/size][hr]tripple post, ftw, please someone? :|

item.title: How can I make my Npcs move?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

spawn = 520 0001 0001 0 0 0 0 1 0
If 520 is your npc
001 and 001 are your coordinates.
Then the next number is the height.
Then the next 4 numbers are your ranges so you can make them walk in that area.
So the Very last number you would edit to like a 1, 2, or 3.
Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my Npcs move?
